name: @coffeekraken/docblock-json-to-markdown
description: Transform with ease a coffeekraken-docblock-parser resulting JSON into a beautiful markdown file

scripts.demo: rm -rf demo/*.md && node demo/parse-js.js && node demo/parse-php.js && node demo/parse-scss.js

author: Coffeekraken <hello@coffeekraken.io>
